aircraft.value: Vulture Heavy - AC-1901-649 at Training Center Beta

defect_observed.value: Bleed air temperature exceedance. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Contamination ingress through damaged seal assembly

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Air Conditioning component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme

preventive_action.value: Update technical documentation with lessons learned

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 19/09/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 20/09/2023 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 24/09/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 24/09/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 27/09/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar
